itemDescription: British author, rugby player, soldier and war correspondent

wikipedia_page.main: Major Philip Henry Lawless MC (9 October 1891 – 10 March 1945) was a British author, journalist, rugby player, soldier and war correspondent.

response: * Peter Lawless (ed.), The Golfer's Companion, J M Dent, 1937

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Major Peter Lawless MC (1891–1945), war correspondent for The Daily Telegraph, killed during the Battle of RemagenObituary, The Times, 13 March 1945, p.6
